Pingouin Bleu

by DjCouchyCouch

Released Dec 6, 2014
Players 1
License Unknown

Download ROM

Description

Pingouin Bleu is a horizontal shmup. A to shoot; B to switch between three weapons; C to "grab" things, but it's a prototype feature and only works on the red spinning guys. I figured I'd keep it in for fun. Pick up stars left by defeated enemies to boost your weapon meter. More stars equals upgraded weapons.
